scripts.setup: snarkjs groth16 setup build/preimage.r1cs pot12_final.ptau build/circuit_0000.zkey && snarkjs zkey contribute build/circuit_0000.zkey build/circuit_final.zkey --name="demo contribution" -v
scripts.export-verifier: snarkjs zkey export verificationkey build/circuit_final.zkey build/verification_key.json
scripts.prove: snarkjs groth16 prove build/circuit_final.zkey witness.wtns proof.json public.json
scripts.verify: snarkjs groth16 verify build/verification_key.json public.json proof.json
